text: Juan Ángel Iglesias Marcelo (1 March 1931 - 1 February 2022) was a Spanish politician. He was a Senator from 1982 until 2000. He was also Mayor of Cáceres from 1983 until 1987. He was born in Cáceres, Spain. Iglesias Marcelo was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. Iglesias Marcelo died on 1 February 2022 from multiple organ failure in Cáceres, one month before his 91st birthday.Fallece el exalcalde de Cáceres Juan Iglesias Marcelo a los 90 años ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish mayors Category:Spanish Socialist Workers' Party politicians
title: Juan Iglesias Marcelo
